entry.title: GO - Context 源码解读
entry.content:
GO - Context 源码解读

核心接口

//Context interfacetype Context interface {    //返回过期时间    Deadline() (deadline time.Time, ok bool)    //返回 channel。用来判断 goroutine 是否结束    Done() <-chan struct{}    //goroutine 结束错误提示    Err() error    //根据Key返回value    Value(key interface{}) interface{}}// sentinel Error; 主动 cancelvar Canceled = errors.New("context canceled")// sentinel Error - Deadline Errorvar DeadlineExceeded error = deadlineExceededError{}type deadlineExceededError struct{}func (deadlineExceededError) Error() string   { return "context deadline exceeded" }func (deadlineExceededError) Timeout() bool   { return true }func (deadlineExceededError) Temporary() bool { return true }//空 Context; 实现 Context interface type emptyCtx intfunc (*emptyCtx) Deadline() (deadline time.Time, ok bool) {    return}func (*emptyCtx) Done() <-chan struct{} {    return nil}func (*emptyCtx) Err() error {    return nil}func (*emptyCtx) Value(key interface{}) interface{} {    return nil}var (    background = new(emptyCtx)    todo       = new(emptyCtx))//返回 emptycxtfunc Background() Context {    return background}func TODO() Context {    return todo}

cancelCtx Struct - 实现取消功能

//包装Context。创建新的 Context type cancelCtx struct {    Context    mu       sync.Mutex            // 用来保护后面的是那个字段    done     chan struct{}         // created lazily, closed by first cancel call    children map[canceler]struct{} // set to nil by the first cancel call    err      error                 // set to non-nil by the first cancel call}//获取 channel；用来判断是否关闭func (c *cancelCtx) Done() <-chan struct{} {    c.mu.Lock()    if c.done == nil {        c.done = make(chan struct{})    }    d := c.done    c.mu.Unlock()    return d}//获取关闭原因func (c *cancelCtx) Err() error {    c.mu.Lock()    err := c.err    c.mu.Unlock()    return err}//func (c *cancelCtx) Value(key interface{}) interface{} {    if key == &cancelCtxKey {        return c    }    return c.Context.Value(key)}//取消contextfunc (c *cancelCtx) cancel(removeFromParent bool, err error) {    //如果没有传递取消原因，直接panic    if err == nil {          panic("context: internal error: missing cancel error")    }    c.mu.Lock()    //已经存在取消原因，说明已经取消，直接返回    if c.err != nil {          c.mu.Unlock()        return // already canceled    }    //赋值取消原因    c.err = err      if c.done == nil { //如果通道是nil。赋值一个关闭的通道        c.done = closedchan    } else { //如果通道不是 nil 。直接关闭当前通道        close(c.done)     }    //遍历子节点，层级关闭    for child := range c.children {        // NOTE: acquiring the child's lock while holding parent's lock.        child.cancel(false, err)    }    c.children = nil    c.mu.Unlock()    //解除绑定关系    if removeFromParent {        removeChild(c.Context, c)    }}

timerCtx - 取消，定时自动取消

// 对 cancelCtx 的 再次包装// 在 cancelCtx 的基础上增加了定时器，自动取消功能type timerCtx struct {    cancelCtx    timer *time.Timer // Under cancelCtx.mu.    deadline time.Time}//返回到期时间func (c *timerCtx) Deadline() (deadline time.Time, ok bool) {    return c.deadline, true}//取消自动取消func (c *timerCtx) cancel(removeFromParent bool, err error) {    c.cancelCtx.cancel(false, err)    if removeFromParent {        // Remove this timerCtx from its parent cancelCtx's children.        removeChild(c.cancelCtx.Context, c)    }    c.mu.Lock()    if c.timer != nil {        c.timer.Stop()        c.timer = nil    }    c.mu.Unlock()}

valueCtx struct - 实现数据存储

//包装 context，实现数据存储type valueCtx struct {   Context   key, val interface{}}//根据 key 获取 valuefunc (c *valueCtx) Value(key interface{}) interface{} {    if c.key == key {        return c.val    }    return c.Context.Value(key)}

propagateCancel、removeChild - 绑定 parent 和 child

// parent 和 child 设置关联关系；一旦 parent 取消。则 child 取消func propagateCancel(parent Context, child canceler) {    done := parent.Done()    //父级永远不会被取消，因此不必把 child 和 parent 做关联    //这种情况的parent 一般是 context.Background() OR context.TODO()    if done == nil {        return // parent is never canceled    }    //父级已经被取消，直接取消 child    select {    case <-done:        // parent is already canceled        child.cancel(false, parent.Err())        return    default:    }    //断言父级，断言是否是 cancelCtx    //    如果是：把 child 放置到 parent 的 children 字段    //  如果不是：开启 goroutine 监控父级done，父级取消，则取消child    if p, ok := parentCancelCtx(parent); ok {        p.mu.Lock()        if p.err != nil {            // parent has already been canceled            child.cancel(false, p.err)        } else {            if p.children == nil {                p.children = make(map[canceler]struct{})            }            p.children[child] = struct{}{}        }        p.mu.Unlock()    } else {        atomic.AddInt32(&goroutines, +1)        go func() {            select {            case <-parent.Done():                child.cancel(false, parent.Err())            case <-child.Done():            }        }()    }}//断言 parent Context 的类型是否是 *cancelCtxfunc parentCancelCtx(parent Context) (*cancelCtx, bool) {    done := parent.Done()    if done == closedchan || done == nil {        return nil, false    }    p, ok := parent.Value(&cancelCtxKey).(*cancelCtx)    if !ok {        return nil, false    }    p.mu.Lock()    ok = p.done == done    p.mu.Unlock()    if !ok {        return nil, false    }    return p, true}// removeChild removes a context from its parent.func removeChild(parent Context, child canceler) {    p, ok := parentCancelCtx(parent)    if !ok {        return    }    p.mu.Lock()    if p.children != nil {        delete(p.children, child)    }    p.mu.Unlock()}

Withcancel、WithDeadline、WithTimeout、WithValue

// cancelCtx struct 包一下Context，然后返回func WithCancel(parent Context) (ctx Context, cancel CancelFunc) {    c := newCancelCtx(parent)    propagateCancel(parent, &c)    return &c, func() { c.cancel(true, Canceled) }}// 在 cancelCtx 的基础上，支持定时自动取消功能func WithDeadline(parent Context, d time.Time) (Context, CancelFunc) {    if cur, ok := parent.Deadline(); ok && cur.Before(d) {        // The current deadline is already sooner than the new one.        return WithCancel(parent)    }    c := &timerCtx{        cancelCtx: newCancelCtx(parent),        deadline:  d,    }    propagateCancel(parent, c)    dur := time.Until(d)    if dur <= 0 {        c.cancel(true, DeadlineExceeded) // deadline has already passed        return c, func() { c.cancel(false, Canceled) }    }    c.mu.Lock()    defer c.mu.Unlock()    if c.err == nil {        c.timer = time.AfterFunc(dur, func() {            c.cancel(true, DeadlineExceeded)        })    }    return c, func() { c.cancel(true, Canceled) }}// 定时取消的变一种形式，传递的不再是到期时间，而是相对当前时间的时间间隔func WithTimeout(parent Context, timeout time.Duration) (Context, CancelFunc) {    return WithDeadline(parent, time.Now().Add(timeout))}// 在 context 存储数据func WithValue(parent Context, key, val interface{}) Context {    if key == nil {        panic("nil key")    }    if !reflectlite.TypeOf(key).Comparable() {        panic("key is not comparable")    }    return &valueCtx{parent, key, val}}

总结

基于 cancelCtx、timerCtx、valueCtx 三中 struct 以及对应的方法。实现了 批量、定时发送取消信号、数据存储的功能。其中 核心方法包括

  • cancel() 用于发送取消信号（通过关闭通道 close(c.done) 发送）
  • propagateCancel() 关联 parent 和 child。做到一旦 parent cancel 则 child cancel
  • WithValue() 通过key获取存储的value
